mjaksic.Kafka_To_Hive.hive.streaming

Class Streamer

  • java.lang.Object
    • mjaksic.Kafka_To_Hive.hive.streaming.Streamer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class Streamer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable
    Streams data into an (unpartitioned) Hive table. Hides how Hive transactions work.
